poem:
### Confluences

In the jostle  
of egos,  
a dance unfolds—  
billionaire dreams  
tangle with  
theatrical schemes.  
  
A world of  
stagecraft,  
power's twist  
like vine—  
each craves  
their moment  
under  
flickering   
spotlight,  
  
but who takes  
center stage,  
in the end,  
when curtains  
call?
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Seth Meyers on Elon Musk: ‘Donald Trump finally got his own Donald Trump’ Late-night hosts talk tension within Donald Trump’s transition team over the presence of Elon Musk, Matt Gaetz not returning to Congress and Wicked’s box office dominance. Seth Meyers Seth Meyers checked in with the incoming Trump administration on Monday evening, amid reports that Trump’s team has grown frustrated with his adviser Elon Musk acting like a “co-president” and “making sure everyone knows". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
